subject: Internal And External Solution Galleries Via StarThinker

sections.header: One Solution Two Ways To Get It To Clients
sections.paragraph: StarThinker solutions are now available on [GitHub](https://google.github.io/starthinker/) and a [Gallery](https://google.github.io/starthinker/).  One solution in two places means less maintenance and more options for clients, partners, and sales.  Every solution comes with a shareable sample, pitches, documentation, and two solution galleries...

grid.paragraph: Each solution can be deployed without coding using the [StarThinker UI](http://go/starthinker).  All jobs run as you.
Download the source and have your development team customize any part of StarThinker or its solutions.
Deploy any solution using the [StarThinker UI](https://github.com/google/starthinker/blob/master/tutorials/deploy_enterprise.md) in a few minutes for any client. Get impact done.
Use [The External GitHub Gallery](https://google.github.io/starthinker/) as a pitch book for partners. Get ideas going.
Check out the [Development Guide](https://github.com/google/starthinker/tree/master/tutorials#development) for packaging and distributing scaled solutons fast. Reach more clients.
Use the [Soluton Gallery](https://google.github.io/starthinker/) to locate client friendly demos and pitch materials. Impress clients.
